operation.query: INSERT INTO QUOTE (SLS_QTN_ID,CREATION_PERSON_ID,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY) VALUES (?,?,?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?)

INSERT INTO QUOTE_VERSION (SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,UQID,REFERENCED_UQID,ORIG_ASSET,COMPLETION_TS,DELIVERY_TERMS, PRICE_LIST_TYPE,LAST_PRICED_DT,VISIBILITY_STATE,SHARE_STATE,REGION_CD,PRICE_GEO,CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NAME,HIDE_ZERO_DOLLAR_IND,PA_NR, PA_CAC,PA_DISCOUNT_GEO,E_DELIVERY_EMAIL,OPPORTUNITY_ID,MODIFIED_TS,MODIFIED_PERSON_ID,TOTAL_AMT,AIRPACKED_TOTALWEIGHT,PA_EXPIRY_TS, ASSET_QUOTE_NR,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY,CREATION_PERSON_ID,EUC_RFP_NR,RSLR_EXCLV_FL, W_L_STAT_CD,EST_TOT_K_AM,QUOTE_DISTRIB_DT,BUS_MODEL_CD,MC_CHARGE,OPG_NUM,PAYMENT_DAYS,CASH_DISC_PCT,BAL_TO_FINANCE,LEASE_TERM, PAY_FREQUENCY,BDM_EXP_NOTIFY_FL,PAY_AMOUNT,ORDER_BGN_DT,ORDER_END_DT,QUOTE_DIST_DT_GMT,COMPLEX_DEAL_FL,AGENT_DEAL_FL,DEAL_KIND, PRMRY_QUOTE_URL,DIRECT_FL,TERM_COND_ID,QUOTE_PRIMARY_RSLR_TYPE,OPPORTUNITY_ORIG_SYSTEM,REQUEST_ID,ASSET_QUOTE_VRSN,PDF_REF_ID, PDF_ENCRYPTED_ID,NAME,PAYMENT_TERM,SUB_TOTAL_AMT,TOTAL_TAX_AMT,DISCOUNT_PCT,DEAL_NR,TOTAL_LIST_PRICE_AMT,ASSET_INSTANCE,SFDC_STATUS ,REQUEST_F_QUOTE_RCVD_TS,SHIPPING_AND_HANDLING_AMT) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,?, to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,?,?,?,?, to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),?)

UPDATE QUOTE SET CREATION_PERSON_ID=?,DELETE_IND=?,CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_BY=?,LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), LAST_MODIFIED_BY=? WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=?

UPDATE QUOTE_ITEM SET PRODUCT_NR=?,UCID=?,UC_SUB_CONFIG_ID=?,UC_LINE_ITEM_ID=?,PRICE_ERROR_MSG=?,PRODUCT_LINE=?,PRICING_RATE=?,PRICING_RATE_TYPE=?,PA_NR=?, PA_EXHIBIT_NR=?,PA_CAC=?,PA_DISCOUNT_RATE=?,PA_DISCOUNT_GEO=?,PA_EXPIRY_DT=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),PA_BUYER_TYPE=?,PA_CUSTOMER_NAME=?, PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION=?,PRICE_STATUS=?,UNIT_LIST_PRICE_STRING=?,UNIT_NET_PRICE_STRING=?,ACTIVITY_STATUS_CODE=?,PRODUCT_CLASS_CODE=?,PRICE_SOURCE_CODE=?,DEAL_NR=?, ASSET_ITEM_NR=?,PRODUCT_OPTION=?,AIRPACKED_UNITWEIGHT=?,BUNDLE_ID=?,DELETE_IND=?,CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_BY=?, LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),LAST_MODIFIED_BY=?,LINE_TYPE_CD=?,ASSOC_PF_CD=?,LINE_PROG_CD=?,SPCL_CONFIG_FL=?,PRODUCT_ID=?,VERSION_CREATED=?, SPECIAL_PAYMENT_AMT=?,SOURCE_CONFIG_ID=? WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_ITM_SQN_NR=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

UPDATE QUOTE_VERSION SET UQID=?,REFERENCED_UQID=?,ORIG_ASSET=?,COMPLETION_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),DELIVERY_TERMS=?,PRICE_LIST_TYPE=?,LAST_PRICED_DT=?, VISIBILITY_STATE=?,SHARE_STATE=?,REGION_CD=?,PRICE_GEO=?,CUSTOMER_COMPANY_NAME=?,HIDE_ZERO_DOLLAR_IND=?,PA_NR=?,PA_CAC=?,PA_DISCOUNT_GEO=?,E_DELIVERY_EMAIL=?, OPPORTUNITY_ID=?,MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),MODIFIED_PERSON_ID=?,TOTAL_AMT=?,AIRPACKED_TOTALWEIGHT=?,PA_EXPIRY_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), ASSET_QUOTE_NR=?,DELETE_IND=?,CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_BY=?,LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),LAST_MODIFIED_BY=?, CREATION_PERSON_ID=?,EUC_RFP_NR=?,RSLR_EXCLV_FL=?,W_L_STAT_CD=?,EST_TOT_K_AM=?,QUOTE_DISTRIB_DT=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),BUS_MODEL_CD=?,MC_CHARGE=?, OPG_NUM=?,PAYMENT_DAYS=?,CASH_DISC_PCT=?,BAL_TO_FINANCE=?,LEASE_TERM=?,PAY_FREQUENCY=?,BDM_EXP_NOTIFY_FL=?,PAY_AMOUNT=?,ORDER_BGN_DT=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), ORDER_END_DT=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),QUOTE_DIST_DT_GMT=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),COMPLEX_DEAL_FL=?,AGENT_DEAL_FL=?,DEAL_KIND=?,PRMRY_QUOTE_URL=?, DIRECT_FL=?,TERM_COND_ID=?,QUOTE_PRIMARY_RSLR_TYPE=?,OPPORTUNITY_ORIG_SYSTEM=?,REQUEST_ID=?,ASSET_QUOTE_VRSN=?,PDF_REF_ID=?,PDF_ENCRYPTED_ID=?,NAME=?, PAYMENT_TERM=?,SUB_TOTAL_AMT=?,TOTAL_TAX_AMT=?,DISCOUNT_PCT=?,DEAL_NR=?,TOTAL_LIST_PRICE_AMT=?,ASSET_INSTANCE=?,SFDC_STATUS=?, REQUEST_F_QUOTE_RCVD_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),SHIPPING_AND_HANDLING_AMT=? WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

UPDATE SLS_QTN SET BID_NR=?,CREATED_BY=?,CUST_SPCFD_QT_NR=?,DESCRIPTION=?,LAST_MODIFIED_BY=?,NAME=?,BID_IND=?, BID_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), DELETE_IND=? WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=?

UPDATE SLS_QTN_ITEM SET SLS_QTN_PRCG_GRP_ID=?,AGRMNT_VRBL_RT_PC=?, AGRMNT_VRBL_LCL_AMT=?,SLS_QTN_SCTN_SQN_NR=?,CUST_SPCF_DN=?,DSPLY_SQN_NR=?,PROD_PRC_EFF_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), PROD_LAST_PRC_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),QUANTITY=?,LCL_XTND_NT_AMT=?,LCL_UNT_LST_AMT=?,LCL_UNT_NT_AMT=?, ACCT_XTND_NT_AMT=?,ACCT_UNT_LST_AMT=?,ACCT_UNT_NT_AMT=?,EXPLSN_IND=?,PROD_CLSFN_CD=?,PROD_ID=?,UNT_OF_MSR_CD=?,PROD_BS_PRC_TYP_CD=?, WRLD_RGN_ID=?,PROD_PRMTN_ID=?,SLS_AGRMNT_IND=?,SLS_OPPRTNTY_IND=?,PRC_OVRRD_IND=?,PRCG_GRP_IND=?, PRC_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),SLS_OPRTNY_ID=?,SLS_OPRTNY_ITM_NR=?,SLS_EVT_TRMS_TMPL_GRP_CD=?,AGRMNT_VRBL_PRC_IND=?, PRC_ADJ_MTD_CD=?,AGRMNT_VRBL_ACCT_AMT=?,DELETE_IND=?,CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_BY=?, LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),LAST_MODIFIED_BY=? WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_ITM_SQN_NR=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

UPDATE SLS_QTN_VRSN SET DESCRIPTION=?,CREATION_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), EXPIRY_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CURRENCY_CD=?,HAND_OFF_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), SLS_QTN_VRSN_RSN_CD=?,EFFECTIVE_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),SLS_QTN_VRSN_TYP_CD=?,SLS_QTN_VRSN_RQSTR_CD=?, SLS_QTN_VRSN_TAT_GOAL_CD=?,COUNTRY_CD=?,LANG_CD=?,CHAR_SCRIPT_CD=?,SLS_QTN_TAT_XCDD_RSN_CD=?,CUST_PRCH_ORD_NR=?, RQST_F_ORD_RCVD_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CUST_RQST_HND_OFF_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),ENTRS_LGL_ENT_NR=?, SLS_QTN_VRSN_STTS_CD=?,SLS_PERS_ID=?,SLS_CHNL_CD=?,SLS_QTN_VRSN_TAT_GOAL_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),TAT_XCDD_IND=?, DFLT_RQRD_DLVRY_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),DFLT_RQRD_DLVRY_LEAD_TM_QTY=?,DFLT_INFCR_OTR_PRTY_SITE_ID=?, DFLT_ULT_CNSG_OTR_PRTY_SITE_ID=?,DFLT_PYR_OTR_PRTY_SITE_INSN_ID=?,DFLT_END_CUST_OTR_PRTY_SITE_ID=?,DFLT_INV_TO_OTR_PRTY_SITE_ID=?, DFLT_SHP_TO_OTR_PRTY_SITE_ID=?,SLD_TO_OTR_PRTY_SITE_INSN_ID=?,CSTM_CNFGN_IND=?,CNFGN_OVRD_APRVL_IND=?,DELETE_IND=?, CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_BY=?,LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),LAST_MODIFIED_BY=?, CUST_RQST_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS') WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

UPDATE QUOTE_BUNDLE SET PRODUCT_BASE_NR=?,PROD_OPT_CD=?,QTY=?,PRODUCT_DESCRIPTION=?,LIST_PRICE=?,AUTH_BD_NET_PRC_AM=?, AUTH_INCR_DISC_AM=?,VERSION_CREATED=?,ASSOC_PL=?,DISC_AS_PCT=?,DISC_TYPE_CD=?,AUTH_DISC_OT_PC=?,BANDED_FL=?,DELETE_IND=?, CREATED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),CREATED_BY=?,LAST_MODIFIED_TS=to_date(?,'MM/DD/YYYY HH24:MI:SS'),LAST_MODIFIED_BY =? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ITM_SQN_NR,SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,CMNT_ID,CMNT_TEXT_MEMO,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY FROM QUOTE_ITEM_COMMENT WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ITM_SQN_NR,SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,SCALE_ID,DISC_TYPE_CD,PROD_LST_PRC_AM,AUTH_BD_NET_PRC_AM,AUTH_DISC_OT_PC,HIGH_RSLR_A_SD_PC,UPPER_BNDRY_DT, LOWER_BNDRY_DT,AUTH_FL,AUTH_FIX_DISC_AM,AUTH_INCR_DISC_AM,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY,EXT_AUTH_BD_NET_PRC_AM FROM QUOTE_ITEM_DISC_SCALE WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?
SELECT SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,COUNTRY_NM,COUNTRY_CD,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY FROM QUOTE_MULTI_COUNTRY WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ITM_SQN_NR,SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,GROUP_ID,GROUP_DESC,QTY,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY FROM QUOTE_NCGROUPS WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,RSLR_TYPE,CUST_NAME,RSLR_CITY_NM,RSLR_ST_PROV_CD,RSLR_CNTRY_CD,OUTLET_ID,RSLR_SEARCH_KEY,PTNR_CMPNY_ID,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS, CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY,RSLR_ID FROM QUOTE_RESELLER WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ITM_SQN_NR,SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,LOAD_TYPE,EST_QTY,MTH1_QTY,MTH2_QTY,MTH3_QTY,MTH4_QTY,MTH5_QTY,MTH6_QTY,MTH7_QTY,MTH8_QTY,MTH9_QTY, MTH10_QTY,MTH11_QTY,MTH12_QTY,MTH13_QTY,MTH14_QTY,MTH15_QTY,RSLR_MAX_QTY,ORDR_MIN_QTY,LINE_MAX_QTY,RSLR_MIN_QTY,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS, LAST_MODIFIED_BY FROM QUOTE_ROLLOUT WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,QTN_SOURCE,LNK_SLS_QTN_ID,LNK_SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,LNK_QTN_SOURCE,UPDATE_IND,DELETE_IND,CREATED_DATE,CREATED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE,LAST_MODIFIED_BY FROM QUOTE_TO_QUOTE_LINK WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?

SELECT SLS_QTN_ID,SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR,SLS_QTN_VRSN_CMT_SQN_NR,CMT_TXT,CMT_INRN_ONLY_IND,DELETE_IND,CREATED_TS,CREATED_BY,LAST_MODIFIED_TS,LAST_MODIFIED_BY FROM SLS_QTN_VRSN_CMT WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?
SELECT SLS_QTN_VRSN_STTS_CD FROM SLS_QTN_VRSN WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=? AND SLS_QTN_VRSN_SQN_NR=?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SLS_QTN WHERE SLS_QTN_ID=?
SELECT * FROM REPLICATION_MAPPING
SELECT * FROM REPLICATION_EVENT WHERE PROCESSING_STATUS=? AND EVENT_SKIP_FLAG <> 'Y' AND ROWNUM < ?
UPDATE REPLICATION_EVENT SET PROCESSING_STATUS=?, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE RE_EVENT_ID=? AND EVENT_SKIP_FLAG <> 'Y'
UPDATE REPLICATION_EVENT SET PROCESSING_STATUS=?, RETRY_COUNT=?, COMMENTS=?, LAST_MODIFIED_DATE=SYSDATE WHERE RE_EVENT_ID=? AND EVENT_SKIP_FLAG <> 'Y'
UPDATE REPLICATION_EVENT SET PROCESSING_STATUS='READY' WHERE PROCESSING_STATUS='PICKED' AND EVENT_SKIP_FLAG <> 'Y'
